boardgame.name: Löwenherz
boardgame.description: The king lies near death, so the princes compete to dominate the kingdom and secure the throne by grabbing as much land as possible. Each turn a card displays three actions that players can choose from: build a wall, move a wall (expanding your kingdom), place a knight, etc. When more than one player chooses the same action, however, a bidding war takes place. All kinds of bits come in this package_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;walls, castles, knights, and a gorgeous game board that allows for variable setups._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 1997 Deutscher Spiele Preis Best Family/Adult Game Winner
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Garrett_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Games 482 - Meeplefest Night 2, The Final Chapter

Very Good condition - all components are accounted for and in excellent shape. The box itself is in good condition with only minor wear to corners and along edges.
